rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet, positioned in the north-east sector to enhance positive energy.
Secondary bedroom with adequate storage and natural light; designed in the east sector to promote health and activity.
Third bedroom, offering privacy and ample sunlight; positioned in the south-east for stability.
Fourth bedroom with integrated closet space; located in the west sector to support introspection and calmness.
Comfortable guest bedroom designed for visitors, placed towards the north for clarity and positivity.
Dedicated home office with ergonomic design, natural lighting, and minimal distractions; positioned in the south sector to harness focus and productivity.
A quiet library designed for reading and study with ample book storage, placed adjacent to the home office to encourage concentration; oriented in the west sector.
A spacious living room for family gatherings and relaxation, located centrally with access to all rooms. Features a fireplace and comfortable seating.
Modern dining area positioned near the living room; designed for comfortable meal times with natural light from east facing windows.
Fully equipped kitchen featuring modern appliances and a pantry, positioned in the south-west corner to adhere to Vastu principles for harmony in cooking spaces.
General family bathroom with dual sinks and ample storage; placed centrally to facilitate easy access from all rooms.
Small utility room for laundry and maintenance, located near the kitchen in the south-west zone.

openings.description: A grand entrance hall with ample space for movement, incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large windows ensuring natural light and ventilation throughout the property; designed to maximize daylight while maintaining privacy.
A dedicated garage entrance for vehicles, integrated with the main entry area for seamless access.
